page.title: 01EAST NEWPORT
page.content:
This area includes large{housing} areas at Ringland, Alway, Somerton, Corporation Road, adn Maindy;{farming} areas at Nash;{industrial areas}at Leeway and Queensway Meadow; and the large{Llanwern Steelworks}. There are {shopping areas}at Maindy and Corporation Road, and a Superstore is being built at Leeway. There are a number of leisure facilities, e.g. swimming pools, squash courts, sports fields.
There are many{bus services}into the Town Centre of Newport, where there are many more facilities, both leisure and commercial.
This area is close to the{M4} motorway and the{A449}to the Midlands.
